title: Gubbe v2.0
shortDescription: The ultimate launcher experience is here.
longDescription: Welcome to the official Fynox Launcher. We are dedicated to providing the best experience possible. Stay tuned for upcoming events, shop resets, and exclusive rewards only for our community members!

title: New Season Updates
shortDescription: Discover what's new in the latest patch.
longDescription: The latest update brings massive performance improvements and new cosmetics to the shop. We've fixed several bugs related to the launcher connectivity and added support for high-resolution textures.
